title: Thompson
description:
Urban legends are real, and when they materialize to attack people they are called "Folklore".

At first glance the Thompson Company is a modest electronics store, but in reality it is part of the rural branch of "THOMPSON," a secret organization that captures folklores with a secret weapon called "Prismo".

Join agents Emma and Yuliya in their fight against folklore and enjoy this new story full of Urban Legends, Action and Horror!
